title: War Games
description: Star Trek fanfiction - Spock/KirkSequel to You'll Get There in the End (It Just Takes a While). The Federation and the Romulan Empire have been on the verge of war for what sometimes feels like forever; this is the place where what passes for peace might end.Words: 109,651 completeAlso posted at: http://seperis.livejournal.com/796798...
author: Seperis
